title: Discuss Request
content: Customer is king. That goes for my customers too. I discuss the needs and the request with the customer so I know what they expect and what they want.

title: Research
content: After gaining intel, I start researching into the design possibilities of the customer's request. What colours should I use? What typography fits well? I need to understand the key points of their desired design so that I can start creating my own.

title: Designing
content: Go time! I discussed the desired design of the customer and research into their request has been done. Now it's time to create a unique and satisfying design that the customer would love!

title: Done and Delivered
content: As I deliver my finished design, I go over the design to with the customer to make sure everything is to his desires and needs. Once the customer is satisfied, I'm satisfied!
